content.raw:
Here's the PR: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/30/do-not-use-the-suffix-for-the-basic/diff

After that, I think a release of 0.3.0 would be good.
content.html:
Here's the PR: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/30/do-not-use-the-suffix-for-the-basic/diff

After that, I think a release of 0.3.0 would be good.

content.raw: I have one more very small PR that I'll be adding shortly. I recommend waiting until that one gets in before doing a 0.3.0 release, since it fixes the behavior of `find_package( ... EXACT )` for ignition projects.
content.html: I have one more very small PR that I'll be adding shortly. I recommend waiting until that one gets in before doing a 0.3.0 release, since it fixes the behavior of find_package( ... EXACT ) for ignition projects.

content.raw: cool, we should make a 0.3.0 release after this is merged I think
content.html: cool, we should make a 0.3.0 release after this is merged I think

update.title: Added more generic documentation files

content.raw: This is set to `YES` on ign-gui, any reason for the change?
content.html: This is set to YES on ign-gui, any reason for the change?

content.raw:
How will we add extra tags here? For example, ign-gui currently has:

~~~
TAGFILES               = "@CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR@/doc/cppreference.tag.xml = http://en.cppreference.com/w" \
                         "@CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR@/doc/qt.tag.xml=http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/"\
                         "@IGNITION-MATH_DOXYGEN_TAGFILE@ = @IGNITION-MATH_API_URL@" \
                         "@IGNITION-MSGS_DOXYGEN_TAGFILE@ = @IGNITION-MSGS_API_URL@" \
                         "@IGNITION-TRANSPORT_DOXYGEN_TAGFILE@ = @IGNITION-TRANSPORT_API_URL@" \
                         "@IGNITION-COMMON_DOXYGEN_TAGFILE@ = @IGNITION-COMMON_API_URL@"
~~~
content.html:
How will we add extra tags here? For example, ign-gui currently has:

TAGFILES               = "@CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR@/doc/cppreference.tag.xml = http://en.cppreference.com/w" \
                         "@CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR@/doc/qt.tag.xml=http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/"\
                         "@IGNITION-MATH_DOXYGEN_TAGFILE@ = @IGNITION-MATH_API_URL@" \
                         "@IGNITION-MSGS_DOXYGEN_TAGFILE@ = @IGNITION-MSGS_API_URL@" \
                         "@IGNITION-TRANSPORT_DOXYGEN_TAGFILE@ = @IGNITION-TRANSPORT_API_URL@" \
                         "@IGNITION-COMMON_DOXYGEN_TAGFILE@ = @IGNITION-COMMON_API_URL@"

content.raw: Ahh I think this is why I've beein getting a lot of warnings on ign-gui, there this is set to YES, also `WARN_IF_UNDOCUMENTED` and `WARN_IF_DOC_ERROR`
content.html: Ahh I think this is why I've beein getting a lot of warnings on ign-gui, there this is set to YES, also WARN_IF_UNDOCUMENTED and WARN_IF_DOC_ERROR
